snippet: The lawmaker who was apparently the target of the attack, Shukria Barakzai, is an outspoken legislator who has campaigned for women’s rights and has run underground schools for girls.
abstract: Suicide bomber in Kabul attacks armored car carrying lawmaker Shukria Barakzai, killing three people and wounding 32 others; Barakzai survives attack.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Rod Nordland, Ahmad Shakib, Jawad Sukhanyar and Fazl Rahman Muzhary from Kabul, and Declan Walsh from London.

lead_paragraph: The lawmaker who was apparently the target of the attack, Shukria Barakzai, is an outspoken legislator who has campaigned for women’s rights and has run underground schools for girls.

headline.main: Kabul Attack Intended for Lawmaker Kills 3
headline.print_headline: Kabul Attack Intended for Lawmaker Kills 3
